name: Messari
title: Peaq's Max Thake on the complexities of a machine economy on Fully Diluted with Messari Research
text:
Synopsis
Peaq is developing a blockchain-based framework to enable a machine economy, focusing on creating economic infrastructure for machine-to-machine transactions and interactions within decentralized systems.

Key Insights
- The concept of a machine economy goes beyond simple machine-to-machine transactions
- Peaq is building a layer one blockchain with "guard rails" to facilitate economic interactions between machines
- The project views an economy as more than just consumption and provision of goods and services
- The framework is specifically designed to support machines operating in decentralized environments
- The approach represents a novel infrastructure for economic interactions in a machine-driven ecosystem
